4.heading: Action Comics.
4.title: Special Edition [microform]
4.author: [No author]
notes: Published no. 1 (1944) - no. 6 (1945), cf. Overstreet Comic Book Price Guide.

Issues 1-2 and 6 reprint issues of Action comics; issues 3, 5 reprint issues of Superman, and issue 4 reprints an issue of Detective Comics, all with wording simplified as giveaways for the U.S. Navy, cf. Overstreet.
Cover title, no. 1-2, 6: Action Comics Special Edition U.S. Navy.
Cover title, no. 5: Superman Special Edition U.S. Navy.

15.library has: no. C26; C28; C30; F4-F8; C61 (1974-1978) 1. Superhero comics. I. Action Comics, no. 1. II. Detective Comics, no. 27. III. Sensation Comics, no. 1. IV. Whiz Comics, no. 2. V. Batman, no. 1. VI. Wonder Woman, no. 1. VII. All-Star Comics, no. 3. VIII. Flash Comics, no. 1. IX. Superman, no. 1. Call no.
notes: Published no. C26, C28, C30, F4-F8, C61.
Numbers with C prefix share sequence with Limited Collectors' Edition and All-New Collectors' Edition.

Facsimile printings of: Action Comics #1 (C26), Detective Comics #27 (C28), Sensation Comics #1 (C30), Whiz Comics #2 (F4), Batman #1 (F5), Wonder Woman #1 (F6), All-Star Comics #3 (F7), Flash Comics #1 (F8), and Superman #1 (C61)

91.title: Action Comics
notes:
Please scroll down for outline contents of some library-held issues. Features in this comic book include:
  • The Adventures of Marco Polo (issues 1-17)
  • Americommando (issues 53-74)
  • The Americommandos (issue 52)
  • The Atom
  • Bad Bill (issue 4)
  • The Black Pirate (issues 23-36, 38-42)
  • Cabbie Casey (issues 119-120)
  • Chuck Dawson (issues 1-22)
  • Clip Carson (issues 14-36)
  • Congo Bill (issues 37-92, 94-247)
  • Congorilla (issues 248-261)
  • Elmer, the Eel (issue 2)
  • Federal Agent (issues 124, 140)
  • Hayfoot Henry (issues 75-118, 123)
  • Inspector Donald and Bobby (issues 2, 4)
  • Jitters' Jeep (issue 64)
  • Superman (issues 1- )
  • Mr. America (issues 33-51)
  • Pep Morgan (issues 1-41)
  • Phil, the Floater (issue 5)
  • Pilferin' Pete (issue 6)
  • Romeo, the Robot (issue 68)
  • Scoop Scanlon (issues 1-13)
  • Shifty Simpson (issue 3)
  • Sticky-Mitt Stimson (issue 1)
  • Super-Sleuth McFooey (issues 67, 71-74)
  • Supergirl (issues 252-376)
  • Tex Thomson (issues 1-32)
  • Three Aces (issues 18-63)
  • Tommy Tomorrow (issues 127-196, 199-251)
  • The Vigilante (issues 42-198)
  • Vitamin Vic (issues 66, 69-70)
  • Yankee Doodle Doughboy (issue 143)
  • Zatara, Master Magician (issues 1-132, 136, 138, 141)
This list originates from the one in Howard Keltner's Index to Golden Age Comic Books (Detroit, Mich. : J. Bails, 1976)
